title: Loved the hospitality, service and location!
text: Just spent a night at the CR7 Times Square while in town to catch a Broadway play.  The location was terrific, just a few steps from the Port Authority and a short walk to Times Square and Garment district restaurants and shops as well as Hudson Yards, where the High Line starts.  The warmth, consideration and friendliness of the staff was amazing -one of the best experiences we’ve had in NYC.  Jorge, who greeted us at reception welcomed us with an upgrade and said, “welcome home.”  The 24-hour free espresso and coffee machine in the lobby was a great touch and I loved having our own Nespresso machine in our room.  I appreciated that staff took time to explain exactly what was included in the resort fee - as far as what items we could take without charge from the minibar.  We felt like VIPS when we got to the room. Not only did we have a complementary large bottle of water, but someone left us a handwritten welcome note with a cute soccer ball drawstring bag (aka Christiano Ronaldo).  The room was immaculate and the bed was very comfortable.  The size was small but just right for resting between NYC adventures with clever spaces under the bed and hooks, etc for luggage.  My only difficulty was the shower.  Beware that when you turn on the water, it may shoot right out of the open door onto the bathroom floor!  But the water pressure was great and there was plenty of hot water, just a little cosy (think telephone booth - if you’re old enough to remember!).  We’ll definitely stay here again for the wonderful service, value, comfy bed & location!

title: Exceeded all hopes and expectations.
text: This hotel exceeded my expectations. Firstly so easy to get to from the subway at 42nd St or Port Authority bus terminal. Foyer was clean and modern, warm and welcoming. Reception staff had my details to hand making checking in straightforward. Staff very friendly and helpfull. The lifts to the rooms required the door keycards to operate which although slightly inconvenient is a very worthwhile security measure. As a solo traveller the room was an adequate size, easily chilled or warmed with the AC unit below the window. The bed comfortable with ample pillows. Bathroom well stocked with towels and toiletries. Shower excellent. Mini fridge available. Large TV on the wall should it be required. I did select the cheapest room, if I had been travelling with someone. I think the next tariff up would have been required. Foyer had chilled water and hot non alcoholic drinks available as a courtesy 24hr a day. Also bagels and croissants provided early in the morning. Apples available the rest of the time. A simple yet appreciated gesture. The location is fabulous as a base when touring Manhattan no matter your chosen mode of transport. I walked and its central location was ideal. Would I go back ? Absolutely, already planning for later this year, this time with my wife. I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel to anyone thinking of visiting New York City.

title: Not Great
text:
This was my first solo holiday to the US, and I booked the Pestana CR7 to use as a base whilst I was in NYC. This was due to it being within close proximity to Port Authority Bus Terminal, which it was and was brilliant in that regard. 
My observations are as follows:

1) The hotel is more like a hostel than it is a hotel. The reception area is small and constantly filled with young people on laptops. There isn’t a bar or vending machines that I could see, and the only drinks available at the reception was water/coffee. 
2) The room is very small. Very dated. Lots of chips in the furniture, exposed wood. Privacy blinds that let in light as soon as sunrise comes. Corridors are small, lifts take forever and using the keycard system for it takes a while especially with luggage. The room wasn’t to my usual standard I would expect. The room was freezing, and only on the last night did I ask about heating it. When it was heated I was faced with a choice of either icy and silent to fall asleep or warm with a massive hairdryer like sound constantly. 
3) The room I had was opposite another building around 50 yards across. And from 6am workmen were drilling, hammering and erecting scaffolding. The noise was deafening and woke me up, as well as the sunlight and the fact I had no blackout curtains. 
4) Water pressure in the shower is low, don’t go here expecting a power shower! 
5) The reception staff are lovely, I never had a problem with any even though some didn’t have English as their first language. They all helped with any queries and I couldn’t fault them.

title: Um cr7 com muitos golos falhados
text: Começando pelos falhanços: quarto minúsculo e casa de banho micro. Materiais da casa de banho do mais barato do mercado. Luz do quarto de alumiar situações fúnebres. Material das tomadas eléctricas da pior qualidade e sem manutenção, o que leva a várias tomadas partidas e tb sem adaptação para Europa. Tv sem qualquer canal de Portugal e do Brasil, apesar da grande quantidade de hóspedes destes países. Dos 3 elevadores um esteve uma semana em manutenção. Para um edifício de 24 pisos e cheio de hóspedes os 3 elevadores são essenciais. Uma recepção ineficaz: ao chegar ao hotel avisei que por erro colocaram na casa de banho duas embalagens de shampoo e zero de gel de banho. Durante toda a semana da estadia lavei as mãos com shampoo. Não é grave mas demonstra pouca atenção ao cliente pois avisei a receção mais do que uma vez. Os golos marcados: boa localização do hotel. Em minutos a pé chegamos a locais importantes da cidade. Na receção sempre tiveram Bagles, com manteiga ou compota e café, chá ou leite. Esta oferta do hotel é muito simpática. Chegar da rua, do frio e chuva e poder tomar gratuito um chá ou café sabe muito bem.

title: Horrible
text:
I checked in a few weeks ago over the weekend and stayed for a few nights. Great location and free coffee but that is pretty much it. Rooms are small understandable it is New York.

But The hotel doesn't seem to be managed well at all, very disappointing .....

There was this young receptionist during the day time I couldn't catch her name she had a mouth-piercing fairly light skin. She had such a horrible attitude it was unbelievable! I just don't understand how a 4-star company will hire unprofessional workers.

I won't be back, customer service 0 Stars !!!!

title: Fantastic
text: We stayed at pestana Cr7 Times Square between 15 .12.23 to the 23.12.23 the hotel is clean. The staff very polite and welcoming we had a fantastic time, it’s come first serve on bagels in morning for breakfast although we didn’t get down for breakfast till about 9:30 on a few mornings due to very late nights but there still bagels left if that’s what you want for breakfast. The hotel was a perfect location for everything we wanted to do we walked most places although the tube (tram) was easy to navigate highly recommended.

title: Evaluación
text:
Excelente atención, somos de Chile y nos atendieron en perfecto español, muy amables y atentos Marilyn y Vítor F. en recepción al momento de check in, al ingresar todo estaba impecable en limpieza, orden, aseo, especio,etc. 
100% recomendable para llegar en NY

Carolina y Osvaldo

title: Disastrous stay
text:
We had to nights here pre cruise  .
Very  disappointed  it was shown with a bar and resturant  which had be closed down when we were there .  Room was tiny Bathroom was even smaller when you opened the door it was literally a fraction away off the front of the toilet hence you had to squeeze up side the loo to close the door .
As for the bed well forget it if you are under  6 foot and definitely if your also disabled   or pack a ladder to get in .  But don't expect the staff to help with the situation . 
I'm 4 ft 10  the mattress top was almost under my arms   fine if you want  to stand and sleep

title: Correct
text:
Hôtel confortable et central, à 15 mn à pied de Time Square, près du métro qui va à JFK. Bon accueil, mais rue pleine de sdf.
De plus l'hôte facture 25$/nuit pour l'eau et le café dans la chambre, la salle de fitness et le parking, même si vous ne les utilisez pas. Le matin il y a des croissants épuisés en 10mn et une machine à boissons chaudes.

title: New york
text: Every hotel can be nice but it's the small intentions that matters the most. I just graduated and they got me and my mother an amazing room with small present. They really do care about their clients. The workers are always smiling and willing to help out.

title: First time to NYC
text: Marilyn and victor at the front desk were so helpful. We arrived early, and were able to check in early ! That started off our day ! Marilyn gave some great suggestions on how to map out our day to get the most out of it! Super clean lobby, room was nice, and staff is super friendly! Location is great, only few blocks to subways and walking to your favorite spots around the town! Will definitely come back next visit to NYC!

title: Poorly managed property with inexperienced manager
text:
Others need to see this review to consider another hotel to stay. 
Had a reservation from the  11th through the 14th. 
Due to flight issues we were unable to make the first night.
Checked in on the 12th through the 14th.

Her inexperience lacks knowledge  
Looking for a profit rather then showing professionalism and kindness for hardworking people where money and time wasted away because of the property ‘s greed. 
Won’t be back.

title: Comfy!
text:
We have stayed in so many hotels in NY since my niece started going to college in NY. 
 This hotel finally hit home. Clean! Kind staff! Super comfy beds! Great ambience! Great location. We will be going back to this hotel on all of our NY trips. Thank you Andreia and Team!

title: Uma boa escolha de hotel em midtown
text:
O hotel entrega o que promete. Atendimento cordial, localização muito boa, quarto confortável.

Destaque para a cortesia no lobby:
- máquina de café, capuccino, latte, etc. - GRÁTIS
- maçãs - GRÁTIS
- em alguns dias, bagels e croissants - GRÁTIS

Pontos que poderiam ser melhorados:
- mais espaço para guardar roupas
- limpeza do quarto mais cedo (em muitos dias, aconteceu após 16h)

E, por fim, sentimos falta de mais imagens do Cristiano Ronaldo, afinal trata-se de um hotel CR7! ;-)

title: Great stay traveling for work
text:
The staff, particularly Marilyn at the front desk was extremely helpful. I had booked through a third party, and the details had been lost in the transaction. Marilyn took the time to dive into the issue, help me get a refund, find me a new room, and match the price!

Highly recommend.

title: Fantastic hotel
text: Absolutely loved this hotel great location and very welcoming by all staff especially George very nice person and would do anything for you. The hotel was very clean and decor was very modern, reception area is cosy and very welcoming. Would definitely stay here again when we go back.

Great base for our trip to NYC. Well located and nice and clean. Exactly what we wanted. Everything we wanted for fairly nearby. Great coffee bar as well in the lobby for early morning drinks and small breakfast.

title: Fantastic business stay
text: Since the very beginning I felt home. Open arrival I was greeted by a very smily team, which than kept happening thought out my entire stay. They actually knew my name all the time. The room it’s comfy, spacious and stylish with more than the needed amenities. The coffee station available in a lobby area is a plus. I hope to be back very soon.

title: Highly recommend this hotel! 10/10
text:
This hotel made our trip 10/10, couldn’t recommend enough. The staff were incredible from the get go, helped us throughout the trip from the beginning to the end. Especially Marilyn & Victor were so helpful and take customer service to the next level. But all the staff were 10/10. 

The rooms are spacious, especially for New York. The location is just okay but this is not a reflection on the hotel. The subway is a 5 minute walk away, and time square 10min. 

We briefly mentioned it was a birthday trip in the booking stages, we arrived to the staff instantly wishing me a happy birthday upon check in,  a very nice hand written card and a bottle Prosecco in the room. 

The hotel was clean, and the beds were very comfy. We had a complimentary bagel & coffee breakfast but you must get there early as it’s first come first serve, but a nice touch. 

Highly recommend this hotel!

title: Ótimo atendimento e hospedagem
text: O atendimento foi ótimo, nossa hospedagem foi excelente e queríamos agradecer a todos os funcionários que foram super atenciosos, mais agradeço em especial a Marilyn, sempre muito gentil, educada e nos ajudou no que foi preciso.

title: Thank you Marilyn
text: El mejor hotel en New York, la ubicacion es perfecta y cerca de todo. Las habitations son muy comodas y el hotel es hermosillo. Marilyn, la chica de la recepcion es un amor y super encantadora! Te agradezco mucho por todo🫶🏻💕

title: Desde Sevilla a New York
text: Hemos estado genial durante las nueve noches en el hotel. Pero lo que más me gustaría destacar es la calidad humana de sus trabajadores siempre resolviendo cualquier imprevisto y ayudándonos en todas las dudas sobre new york. En especial me gustaría a destacar a Enzo por su amabilidad, simpatía y su ayuda y consejos para desenvolvernos por la ciudad.  Muchísimas gracias!! Te deseamos  lo mejor También señalar a Marilyn por su amabilidad y hospitalidad. Mil gracias!

title: Good and bad.
text: Good and bad, location was excellent and room was clean and tidy and free bagels,tea and coffee. Room was very small even after paying to upgrade and better view( I can't imaging it being smaller without and see pictures for view :( ) luckly we didnt spend much ti.e in it! shower did not work properly either and unexpected deposit on arrival that I am still waiting to be refunded.

title: Very good experience!!
text:
A very pleasant experience.
Lots of friendliness and desire to provide a good service, with a commitment to helping the Customer. A city hotel with a very relaxed service and without the usual stress of these places.
To come back and enjoy.

title: Great hotel
text: First stay in New York & we were very pleased with the Pestana CR7 Times Square. The room was small but clean, tidy & well maintained. Reception staff were very helpful & friendly. The free apples, tea & iced water in reception was a nice touch too. Hotel was a great base for exploring city and close to lots of attractions. Would definitely stay here again

title: When in NY...
text: Best location if you have business in Midtown.  Marilyn S. extends hospitality beyond anything I've ever experienced in NewYork and please believe she is the reason I keep returning to Pestana CR7 Times Square.  I've stayed at other hotels in the Times Square area but hands down Marilyn has always made me feel like it was my home in NY!  She extends a warmth and welcoming that a weary will traveler need.

title: Excelente
text: A localização é maravilhosa e os funcionários são prestativos. O recepcionista Victor é muito atencioso, amavel e simpático. Ele solucionou várias de nossas demandas, inclusive fazer uma reserva que tivemos dificuldade em razão do idioma. Victor fez nossa estadia ser perfeita.

title: The best stay we could have had in NYC with our family!
text:
If you are looking for a hotel that is central, comfortable, and warm, with friendly staff that are always willing to help, this is your best option. When we arrived at the room, my kids were thrilled to find sweets and a personalised welcome card!
Having Marylin and Jenaro as our hotel hosts was an amazing experience. Their guests are treated  with exceptional care, especially the little ones. My kids loved them! It was perfect, thank you so much for your attention. It made all the difference in our family's NYC trip.
As a plus, if you are a Portuguese family like ours, you will feel at home because you will always have someone Portuguese around to wish you "bom dia"! :)

title: praticamente perfetto
text:
ho soggiornato in questo hotel nel periodo tra il 23-29 ottobre, mi sono trovato molto bene per tutta la durata della vacanza. 
il personale molto disponibile e in grado di risolvere i problemi, sono riusciti a fare un cambio stanza senza alcun problema. 
è situato in punto strategico a soli 7 min a piedi da time square e molto vicino alle fermate della MTA. 
La stanza un po' piccolina ma dotata di tutti i confort, silenziosa e pulita. forse l'unica pecca era il sistema di aria condizionata un po' datato ma funzionante.

title: My visit to "Flat Bells" exhibition im MOMA
text: The hotel is well situated, very confortable and the the service is excelent. I'd like to state and thanks all the suggestions of Mrs Andreia in the reception desk. It was my first visita to New York and I"be back!

title: Excellent Service Expérience
text: I have had an amazing stay with my family who came to NYC for the first time. The hotel location is great and the service was exceptional. Marilyn looked after us with great attention and was passionate about her job. She attended to every detail during our stay including recommending the best places to visit in NYC. Overall excellent experience with great service by the Hotel staff. I highly recommend this hotel

title: 3 Night Stay
text:
This is a modern, very well maintained hotel right in the heart of Manhattan, with very competitive rates. Our room (2004) was small but spotless and lots of storage. The room had storage for clothes and cases under the bed, as well as hangers and space to hang clothes. House keeping did a great job each day. 
Our check in experience was not the best. We paid in full on check in, however we were also charged $200 security fee. This fee was not mentioned in any booking emails, or by the lady on check in, it was just charged. I have no problem with a security deposit, but I would like to be informed. It was refunded on check out. The check in lady also did not give us a welcome information pack, I was only aware of it having seen other guests getting one.

Any other issues were outside of the hotels control. Although the location is very central, I would agree with other reviews stating that the street was not the best. On seperate occasions we saw, a drug deal, drug use and the general smell and dirt on the street was not good. My wife would not feel safe on this street after dark.

title: Melhor seria impossível.
text: Localização excelente. Pessoal mto atento e simpático. Quarto mto acolhedor. Hifi sem problemas e grátis. Bom ecran de tv. Limpeza diária e sempre com mudança de toalhas. Ótima experiência e a repetir.

I would like to express my gratitude for the amazing team who is working at PESTANA CR7 Time Square! Justin, Cynthia, Jonell and Victor has been more than amazing, not only as people but as professionals as well! They have been more than welcoming and extremely hospitable! 
I can't express how nice and comfortable they made me feel. I recommend this wonderful hotel with 2 hands. The experience was beyond wonderful! I wish them even more success. I would gladly stay at this hotel when I have another trip to New York!

title: Prestana CR7
text:
The hotel has one of the most professional and compassionate people in the hospitality industry. Everyone makes sure that our stay is more than accommodating and care deeply for safety.

Cynthia, Janell, Victor and Justin are stellar at their jobs! 

Thank you for making us feel like home and for taking impeccable care of us! 

We absolutely recommend Prestana CR7 at Times Square in New York City. 

Thank you so much for everything!

Respectfully,

Stella Petrova

title: Boa opção em NYC
text:
O hotel é novo e muito bem arrumado. A decoração é toda com elementos do futebol e muitas peças autografadas pelo CR7. 
O quarto é grande, principalmente para os padres de Manhattan. 
Staff do hotel é perfeito, os atendentes são muito solicitos, desde o check in até o check out. Pudemos deixar as malas sem problemas no hotel em ambos.
Serviço de quarto muito bom, extremamente organizado e limpo.
Hotel perto do metro e de pontos importantes da cidade, ótima opção de hospedagem.

Felt slightly unsafe in street outside in evenings.

title: Manhattan’s oasis

title: Fijn verblijf in centraal Manhattan
text: Goed hotel en top locatie in het centrum van de stad. Vriendelijke personeel. Fijne kamer, schoon en lekker bed. Prima aanrader. Jammer genoeg geen ontbijt inbegrepen en niet echt een bar of restaurant.

title: Very good location and amazing staff
text:
For us it was the perfect hotel. We could do a lot of our activities on foot and if we had to use the Metro a station is right around the corner.
The team at the reception is amazing. They really listened to all our concerns and found solutions where possible and made us feel at home.

text:

Service bagagerie disponible,  appréciable.
Du pour, du contre. Pour le même prix, je pense que j'irai ailleurs la prochaine fois malheureusement. 
 L'attitude de certains employés n'y étant pas étrangère...

title: Bellissima struttura!consigliato.

Ottima struttura,in una zona centralissima di New York. Il personale molto gentile e cordiale,sempre disponibile alle nostre richieste. La camera molto ampia e pulitissima,ben insonorizzata.Grande TV led in camera e Wifi potente e velocissimo.
Il bagno comodo,pulitissimo e con tutti i comfort. La camera veniva pulita e sistemata dal personale dell'albergo ogni giorno.
Torneremo sicuramente!

title: Recomendo muito esse hotel!
text:
Tive um probleminha na chegada a NY (cheguei ensopada por conta da chuva, sozinha, o voo do meu marido havia sido cancelado, enfim, um pequeno caos). Ao ver a situação, o Ricardo e o George se prontificaram a ajudar, me dando um quarto sem custo muito antes do horário do check-in; eles não tinham nenhuma obrigação de me fornecer aquele quarto, foi apenas por humanidade e gentileza. Sou muito grata a vocês!
Adorei o hotel. A cama e o chuveiro são muito confortáveis; a limpeza foi boa e aconteceu todos os dias; check-in e check-out foram super rápidos; todo o staff é muito gentil; o quarto era super silencioso; ar-condicionado e blackout funcionaram perfeitamente. Adorei a localização: o metrô está pertíssimo, o hotel está localizado no centro da cidade próximo à Times Square, porém não tão próximo a ponto de haver luzes, barulho e hordas de turistas. Na verdade a rua do hotel é bem silenciosa, mas não perigosa. Adoramos o restaurante em frente ao hotel (The Joce).
A diária não inclui café da manhã e o quarto é um pouco pequeno e não tem armário, porém isso não foi nenhuma surpresa, já que essas informações estão descritas no site do hotel. Na rua do hotel tem moradores de rua e usuários de drogas, porém isso não é exclusividade dessa rua; em qualquer hotel que você se hospedar na região central de Manhattan, essa situação estará presente. Mas devo dizer que nos sentimos seguros o tempo todo.
Recomendo muito esse hotel!

title: Disfrutable hotel en NYC
text:
Estuvimos alojados con mi esposa desde el 27 de setiembre al 4 de octubre. Excelente ubicación a pocas cuadras de Time Square, comercios en la zona para todas las necesidades, facilidad de acceso a metro o lineas de bus.
Las instalaciones del hotel son nuevas y cumplen con todos los requisitos para su categoría, limpieza de baños y habitaciones excelente, con refrigerador y cafetera nespreso más los cafés necesarios. 
El punto más importante a destacar es la atención del personal, mucamas, recepcionistas encargados. Siempre dispuestos a ayudar y hacer de la estadía un verdadero disfrute. A todos ellos muchas gracias. 
Hernes Rodriguez & Laura Perdomo

text: The staff were incredibly fantastic.  Bring a flash light!  Room was dark, no lights!  Small but it is NYC.  Location is great. Go do it but bring a flash light.  If coffee isn’t there across the street is good.  7-11 on the block too.  Block away I recommend chicken waffle joint. It was great split the meal!!!

Consigliato

title: Ein traumhaftes Erlebnis im Herzen von New York City
text:
Ich hatte das Glück, im Pestana CR7 Times Square während meines Aufenthalts in New York City zu übernachten, und ich kann ehrlich sagen, dass es ein unvergessliches Erlebnis war. Dieses Hotel verkörpert Luxus, Stil und die perfekte Lage.

Lage: 

Die Lage des Pestana CR7 Times Square ist wirklich unschlagbar. Sie befinden sich buchstäblich mitten im Herzen von Manhattan, nur wenige Schritte von den lebhaften Lichtern des Times Square entfernt. Die Nähe zu Broadway-Theatern, erstklassigen Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und hervorragenden Restaurants macht es zu einem idealen Ausgangspunkt für die Erkundung der Stadt.

Unterkunft: 

Die Zimmer im Pestana CR7 Times Square sind modern, komfortabel und stilvoll eingerichtet. Die Betten sind unglaublich bequem, und die Aussicht aus den Zimmern auf die umliegende Skyline von New York ist atemberaubend. Die Sauberkeit und der Zustand der Zimmer sind tadellos.

Service: 

Der Service im Pestana CR7 Times Square ist erstklassig. Das Personal ist äußerst freundlich, hilfsbereit und professionell. Sie sind stets bereit, Empfehlungen für Restaurants oder Sehenswürdigkeiten abzugeben und sich um jegliche Anliegen der Gäste zu kümmern. Der Concierge-Service ist besonders bemerkenswert.

Einrichtungen: 

Das Hotel bietet einige großartige Einrichtungen, darunter ein hervorragendes Restaurant und eine Bar mit einer breiten Auswahl an Getränken. Das Fitnessstudio ist gut ausgestattet und bietet einen fantastischen Blick auf die Stadt, um Ihre Workouts zu verschönern. Der Innenpool ist ebenfalls ein echtes Highlight und eine willkommene Abkühlung nach einem Tag voller Sightseeing.

Fazit: 

Insgesamt kann ich das Pestana CR7 Times Square uneingeschränkt empfehlen. Es bietet nicht nur eine erstklassige Unterkunft in einer unschlagbaren Lage, sondern auch einen Service und Einrichtungen, die Ihren Aufenthalt in New York City zu einem unvergesslichen Erlebnis machen. Ich freue mich schon darauf, beim nächsten Besuch in der Stadt wieder hier zu übernachten.

title: First time visiting
text: It was our first time visiting and we had the best time! We had a lovely guy called Daniel Nobrega serving us and he made our stay that extra bit special, always with a smile on his face and ready to answer any questions we had! The comfort of the hotel was outstanding and we will Definetly be back!

text: Such a good spot! Very good location, close to the main attractions, perfect for those who have kids. Times Square is only a few steps away, perfect for your instagram account... however, Central Park is 25 minutes walking distnce, but it's worthy. Nice welcoming, Ricardo is a joy of person, always avaible for all kinds of needs.

title: Great time in the Big Apple!
text: Great time in the Big Apple! We were celebrating a special date and we had a little surprise after check in, in our room. The attention to details makes the difference. Thank you so much and my appreciation to Ricardo.

text: This is a lovely hotel.  The staff were friendly, courteous and professional.  The location is great and convenient to Times Square.  The ONLY downside was that the room was incredibly small (150 sq. ft) with no frills (i.e., no iron, microwave, and closet space.  That being said, we love NYC and spend little time in the room.

title: Amazing stay!
text:
Short visit to the city, we were there before but not on that hotel. We are Portuguese and if we see a Pestana Hotel on where we go, we prefer to stay with them. Good price/quality and very very good service. They have staff that speaks Portuguese. The room was really good and the complimentary water and coffee during the afternoon was good.

title: Modern, centrally located, and great staff
text: This was my first experience with a Pestana hotel and it was great. I was in town for UNGA and picked this hotel given its central location and great reviews. The staff were super friendly and helpful. The rooms were modern, the beds comfortable, and the bathrooms well equipped with lovely Portuguese bath products. Emily and Victor at the front desk were especially helpful when I arrived early and needed to switch rooms amidst a busy schedule of meetings. I was in a jr suite for some nights and I would highly recommend if it fits in your budget- it included a walk in closet and a balcony with peekaboo views of Times Square. If you are looking to stay in Midtown, this is a great option.

title: NY pestana Cr7
text:
It was a great experience. The hotel is very good, very clean and smells very well.  Very friendly and super efficient staff.
the city is fantastic and unique, it is worth visiting. It is, without a doubt, an experience to repeat

title: An unforgettable experience
text:
I had the pleasure of experiencing the Pestana CR7 Hotel in Manhattan, and I couldn’t have a better stay. Elegant atmosphere to its outstanding service

Upon arrival, the attentive staff (Ricardo and Jahlil)  made me feel instantly welcomed and ensured a smooth check-in process. The lobby radiated sophistication (NY style) and Cristiano Ronaldo's personal flair, creating a magnificent first impression.

The rooms at Pestana CR7 Hotel were comfortably and style. The plush bedding provided a restful night's sleep, while the lavish bathroom and toiletries added an extra touch of indulgence.

Of noteworthy mention is the exceptional service provided by the talented concierge, Jahlil. His warm and genuine hospitality, combined with a wealth of knowledge about the city, enhanced my entire stay. Jahlil’s thoughtful recommendations and personalized assistance truly made me feel special and ensured that I made the most of my time in New York.

The hotel's convenient location in Manhattan allowed for easy exploration of the city's iconic attractions and renowned dining options. Whether I was strolling through Central Park or enjoying a Broadway show, the hotel's proximity to everything made it an ideal base.

I highly recommend a visit to this establishment if you are seeking a truly memorable stay in Manhattan.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Hotel com boa localização,  quarto pequeno,  mas supre necessidade.  O mais importante foi a atenção que a recepção nos deu, Daniel e Ricardo super solícitos,  educação e atendimento diferenciado.  Parabéns para equipe . Super recomendo

title: Book here just to meet the staff
text: The staff are phenomenal and customer service is top notch.  Check in was quick and they were very accommodating.  The room is truly the smallest hotel room I’ve ever been in but yet very comfortable. There is under bed storage for belongings and I love that the rooms have steamers instead of irons:

title: Decepção
text:
Ficamos decepcionados com o Pestana CR7 NewYork. Apesar da atenção e do atendimento do Daniel ser muito bom , o serviço do hotel se mostrou ineficiente e de baixa qualidade. Todos os 8 dias da nossa estadia foram marcados por falhas constantes . Apesar de registrarmos diariamente as falhas. Não trocaram as toalhas de forma correta , não limparam o quarto , trocaram copos sujos , não repuseram cápsulas de café, açúcar e adoçante. Todos os dias tivemos que solicitar papel higiênico. Uma lástima. Para completar no último dia o serviço de quarto não foi feito. Nem cama , nem toalha, nem lixo , nem limpeza do chão e banheiro.
Parece ironia receber um cartão de desculpas com.o quarto sem arrumar.

title: Férias!
text: Um time de pessoas incríveis! Daniel, Ricardo, Victor todos atenciosos. Recebemos uma surpresa em nosso quarto devido ao nosso noivado. A localização é muito próxima à Times Square. Quarto confortável. Adoramos!

title: 5 stars. I recommend.
text: Great time we had in New York. The city has an amazing vibe, it’s true when they say “the city never sleeps”. The hotel is well located, close to the main transportations. Rooms aren’t quite big but very very comfortable and clean. Staff are always on top! If they spot you have a problem, they will act. As matter a fact, we had on the day we arrived, no hot water was available due a problem they had with the gas supplier, but they compensated us and offered another solutions. Next day hot water was available and we had a lovely time. Thank you for all your amazing service.

title: Very central, clean and comfortable.
text: This hotel is in the heart of New York City. We found it very comfortable and an excellent choice in terms of value. Everything was new and extremely clean. The room was just right for three people but the beds large and relaxing. The bathroom was perfect and taking showers there was a real pleasure. The Front Office Manager Ricardo Sousa helped us to sort out a practical problem brilliantly and so we managed to optimize our stay. Thank you.

title: Lovely staff and great value for money
text:
Stayed in August 2023. I chose the hotel as it was close to the port authority bus terminal and within walking distance to Times Square. I was pleasantly surprised. It was great value for money. The staff were the most friendly and helpful people. I didn’t eat in the hotel as there are many dining options close by. There are plenty of shops mins away to buy snacks, alcohol. The room has the most comfortable beds and a huge tv. I also loved the little coffee machine in the room. The bathroom was small but had lovely products. If you are a larger person, it would be difficult to get in and out of the bathroom as the door opening is very small. I didn’t require daily room cleaning and the staff always knocked and asked if I needed anything. The storage underneath the beds for the suitcases is really useful and keeps the place tidy. There was never any wait for the elevators.
The area around the hotel has many homeless and vagrants which does bring the area down but it didn’t feel too unsafe to me. Like everywhere being vigilant and aware is necessary in a big city. This is a great choice if you need to be beside the bus terminal.

title: Fantastic
text:
We have just returned from a stay in this hotel. There is not anything bad I can say about staying here. We were unfortunate to have no hot water for 2 days but the hotel waivered the resort fee to compensate this. It did not have a major impact on us having no hot water.
The hotel itself is spotlessly clean. The rooms are a bit small but for somewhere to just be sleeping at night they are perfect. There is a mini bar in the room and a coffee machine. Hotel also has lovely shampoo, shower gel and conditioner in the shower. They smelt lovely. The lobby of the hotel is spotlessly clean too and the reception staff are probably some of the most friendliest staff we have come across. Nothing was too much trouble for them.
The area that the hotel is located is fine. The street is fairly quiet and it is within walking distance of many of the major attractions. Yes there are a few homeless people around on the street near to the hotel  but to be honest this is a typical.occurrence in New York. 
Would I stay here again, 100% yes! It’s probably one of the nicest hotels I’ve stayed in.

title: Recommend to stay here
text: The hotel is really nice the only issue was that they had a problem with the gas so we did not have hot water for two days but they did everything in their hands to help us in all that they could :).

title: Fantastisch hotel, absoluut een aanrader!
text:
Wat kan ik over dit hotel vertellen?
Het is in 1 woord fantastisch!
De ligging is perfect, op slechts een paar minuten lopen van times square.

Er staat een espresso apparaat op de kamer en ook krijg je een grote fles water. Koffie en fruit kan je iedere middag in de lobby ophalen. Dus dit hotel is een absolute aanrader! We zijn er 5 nachten geweest en geen moment spijt gehad, een absolute aanrader!

title: Best place to stay visiting NY!
text:
We stayed for 6 nights with the kids (11 and 13) in Pestana CR7 Times Square and we really loved it and felt very welcoming!  
It has a perfect location, walking distance to pretty much everything, restaurants, supermarkets, subway...modern decoration, very comfortable room, always available and really helpful staff. A special word to Jorge and Ana Rita (manager) from the front desk who really made the difference with all the tips on what to do or where to go and visit but also for always being so kind to us and the kids. 
In the reception area they always had a cool water dispenser in the morning (free) and even they don't offer "breakfast included rate", they have a "mini catering service" (payed) with some breakfast options if we wanted to grab something before leaving the hotel. At the end of the day, when we arrived from walking around the city they always had some fruit tea/coffee/cool water (free). It really made the difference.  
The room had a good size for NY standards, mini fridge, 2 really comfortable double beds with good pillows for a good night sleep, drawers and also space to put some suitcases under the bed, usb plugs (no need of adaptors to european plugs), Nespresso machine, a steamer, free and perfectly working wi-fi, wide-screen TV, good AC, good bathroom facilities, a nice walk in shower with quality products available in dispensers (shower gel, shampoo and body lotion). It also had a good air dryer available and lots of daily changed towels.
There's also a nice gym available to hotel guests with all you need to workout.
We could also leave our luggage safely at the hotel and walk around the city after check-out and come back to take the airport transfer that they also took care for us.
This was my 3rd time in NY, my husband's 2nd and kid's 1st. Pestana CR7 Times Square staff really made it very special for our family.
We highly recommend the hotel and we'll definitely stay here next time visiting NY! 

Thanks for everything!
Rita, Miguel, Duarte and Maria. 
We felt like home away from home!

title: A bit of a let down
text:
Pros- Hotel staff was very nice.  My room was clean and the bed very comfortable.  Housekeeping staff very nice.  Lobby is cute and spacious with comfy sofas. It has some fun Christiano Ronaldo items like soccer balls and jerseys on the wall. 
Cons- My shower was so leaky! The seal on the shower door did not seal around the edges. This caused a huge puddle on the floor after every shower. There was no way to prevent it from happening. The shower head was fixed and you can’t adjust it. The shower stall was tiny and no room to move in there- or really even turn around. 
My room faced another building with construction going on. There was a loud drilling noise each morning at 8 am. My room had no view at all and no natural light coming in. It set a bit of a depressing mood. I reserved this hotel using a third party app (Hotel Tonight) I think I was placed in one of the worst rooms because of this. If I ever return I will book direct and pay more for a larger room in a different part of the building.  
Upon check-out I told the front desk agent about the shower.  She was very sweet and apologized (I know it wasn’t her fault) and she said she would report it. I find it hard to believe that this is a new issue though.  I feel a bit bamboozled.

text:

title: Great location, great staff
text:
We stayed here for a week during our visit and found it to be a fantastic hotel.

Just a short walk from Times Square it was close to restaurants, supermarkets and the subway.

The room was well appointed and had everything we needed.  There wasn't much hanging space but there was lots of storage space under the bed and we did have a steamer for our clothes which was a great added bonus.  

There was complimentary coffee although we did have to ask for it to be restocked and we stored things in the mini-bar fridge without any issue.

The air conditioning was great - not too noisy - and the black out blinds were useful.  

We didn't have much of a view - we were at the front of the hotel - but we didn't come to NYC to look out of the window!! 

We didn't make use of the complimentary fruit and bagels which they served in the reception area each morning but it did look a popular choice and a lot of guests took advantage.

The staff were really friendly and helpful and greeted us with a smile every time we left and came back.  It made such a difference to our stay.

Only negative point was the building work going on across the street.  Not the hotels fault but it did mean that we were woken up at 730am on weekdays.  

If we every visit NYC again, we would definitely stay at the Pestana.

title: Great place in a perfect location
text:
This place is a definite recommendation, especially for NYC. You'll be in the absolute middle of it all - walking distance to so many places, especially perfect for Broadway visits. And yet, the street the Pestana is on is kind of not too loud. Windows are new (as is the whole place) and so the noise is not a problem here. Beds are very good (variety of pillows), even though as a European I can really only advise the US to change their ideas about "blankets". ;-) Many have mentioned it and I must agree - the solutions this hotel finds for storing in the room are excellent. Your suitcase will be out of sight, you have space for hanging stuff and 2 big drawers under the bed. I had no space problems and I stayed 11 days. Oh and I "just" had the normal room category. Only tiny thing I would criticize: floors weren't really clean, not when I arrived and never after.
Hair-dryer, steamer for clothes and nice shower amenities are in the room (no cotton pads or other amenities though, bring your own).
Free bagels/croissants are offered in the morning, coffee/tea/water all day.
Best thing about this place: their staff. Friendly way above average, helpful and fun. I wanna point out David and Marilyn especially, but all of them were great.
I'll be back!

title: Un sans faute !!! ( mention spéciale pour le personnel )
text:
J’ai passé en compagnie de ma maman un séjour fantastique d’une semaine à l’hôtel Pestana de New York.

—> HOTEL + SITUATION GÉOGRAPHIQUE 
L’hôtel est très accueillant, moderne et bien situé. Au centre de tout, à 5min à pieds de Time Square et d’une station de métro à partir de laquelle on peut se déplacer partout dans la ville. Pour autant, il est positionné dans une rue calme ce qui évite les nuisances sonores (surtout le soir). 
—> ACCUEIL DE L’HÔTEL 
À l’entrée de l’hôtel se trouve une grande salle où il fait bon vivre et où on a pu passer pas mal de temps; soit pour faire une petite pause au milieu de la journée, mais également le soir quand on commandait à manger dehors et qu’on préférait rentrer manger au calme à l’hôtel. En libre service se trouve aussi du café et du thé ainsi qu’une fontaine à eau. Vous pouvez également demander à ce qu’on vous prête des jeux de société !
—> CHAMBRE
La chambre que nous avons prise (sans option et lit double) était fonctionnelle et très propre. Pas immense mais cela nous a parfaitement convenu. Il y a une télé et une clim dans chacune des chambres et les lits sont confortables. 
—> « PETIT DÉJEUNER »
Je le mentionne entre guillemets car l’équipe précise bien que ce qui est servi le matin à l’hôtel ne fait pas vraiment office de petit déjeuner. Mais il est toutefois servi chaque matin à partir de 7h des pommes, des baggels et des croissants avec grille pain, confitures, beurre (et la machine à café et le thé toujours à disposition) jusqu’à épuisement de la quantité disponible (en général vers 9h-9h30). C’était suffisant pour nous permettre de bien commencer notre journée !
—> PERSONNEL 
Quant au personnel… c’est ce qui a fait toute la différence du séjour. Toujours au petit soin et disponible pour nous aider à organiser notre séjour le mieux possible, pour découvrir les meilleurs spots et adresses de Manhattan. SUPERBE équipe !

+ à noter aussi que le jour de votre arrivée et de votre départ il est possible de laisser vos bagages à l’accueil pour profiter de la journée en attendant que la chambre soit disponible où alors de vous rendre à l’aéroport pour le départ.

text:
Personnel très accueillant, toujours le sourire. La qualité de l’hôtel est parfaite, les chambres sont super propre, la propreté est au rendez-vous !!!!! La literie est d’un confort extrême !!!!!!!!
Petit déjeuner gratuit ( café, eau, thé, croissant, Bagels, pommes….)
Un grand merci.

title: My main pick in Manhattan!
text: I've stayed at some hotels in Manhattan and I've got to say this would be my main pick from now on. It's super well located, 10 min away from almost everything, which makes it perfect to go in and out, between your daily trips. The rates are great for all that you get, the space in the rooms is very well managed with the drawers under the bed, silent through all day and night, A/C working fine. The lobby is great to work and chill and there's always coffee served. And as a plus, the staff is super friendly and always ready to assist you. If you're portuguese you'll find many portuguese working on the staff, which will get you that extra coziness you might be looking during your NY stay. It's an overall great choice!

title: A wonderful stay
text:
My friend and I stayed at Pestana CR7 hotel in the beginning of January for about 8 nights. 
The hotel is situated in the heart of Manhattan, 5 minutes walking distance to Times Square and close to the main attractions. 
The room was perfect, very clean, quiet, and comfortable. 
The beds were so comfy and we were glad to find in our room a modern hairdryer and a clothes steamer which was very handy and useful, especially for people that come from afar.
But the best part of Pestana CR7 hotel was the staff,  friendly and helpful! 
I wanna say thanks in particular to Mohamed K. who was very professional and so polite with us,  attentive to our needs from the first day to the last. He also gave us some good advices about the city and he was always ready to help us! Also thanks to the rest of the staff (Judite, Daniela, Victoria, Victor, Emily and Mihaela) who all made our stay special ❤️  

We will certainly come back!

title: Well done Pestana CR7!
text:
The Pestana CR7 is very well located. That was awesome because we could get some rest and shower after our daily strollings, right before we headed to dinner and night-outs. The rooms are very confortable and well decorated. Bathrooms are impeccable!
Big big plus for the always available coffee in lobby and the staff was always very friendly and helpful. Totally reccomended!

title: Great hotel and Victor is the best!
text: The hotel is beautiful and in a great location. Very comfy and perfect for our stay. Victor helped us out and he was amazing and so kind. He was a great help when we wanted to leave our bags and explore a bit more after checking out. Definitely plan on staying here again next time i’m in NYC.

title: Nice property with great staff, but a few annoyances
text:
Lovely staff and one of the nicer-looking hotels we’ve stayed in at a value point in Manhattan. Although our King room was small, it felt relatively spacious thanks to smart design. The bed and pillows were very comfortable, and the bathroom was very attractive with a black tile floor and vessel sink. Nice shower products in dispensers (although two dispensers didn’t work)

But clearly some kinks need to be worked out: the TV only paired with an android phone or PC, and we arrived with iphones and a mac…so no netflix for us. There was a kind of obnoxious rotating light show behind the TV that was difficult to turn off, and then sprung to life again in the middle of the  night, waking us up. No towel hooks in the bathroom, and not enough light to apply makeup. Even though the property is only two years old, the bathroom door and furniture in our room had some visible dings, which detracted from the fun and attractive aesthetic. 

But the lovely staff let us leave our luggage for 4 hours after checkout, ans couldn’t have been more accommodating..

title: I do not recommend this hotel due to their strict refund policy
text:
I do not recommend this hotel due to their strict refund policy. I had booked two nights, 4/12-4/14, with the hotel. My flight from Fort Lauderdale that left at 4pm 4/12, was delayed 8 times and cancelled indefinitely on the 2 attempt due to a storm cell that covered the area that brought 20 inches of rain to the runway. This eventually caused the airport to shut down for 12 hours, leaving us stuck in the airport. I called the hotel the night of 4/12 to advise that I was going to be arriving late, not knowing that my flight was going to be cancelled. I called the hotel again the next day after the airport reopened, 4/13, to advise them of the situation and they told me to call back the vendor that I booked with. I did and they contacted the hotel with the hotel's response being that they could not honor a refund as there was no contact made. I can accept that I would have to pay for one night but not the second as I called the next day and was pushed away by the hotel.

Very disappointed on this, was hopeful to stay at this hotel and content with the hotels review. Mostly because my boyfriend also booked the following two night and received a refund. Of course his circumstance was better as he was not going through a natural disaster on the check in date. But I should at least have recieved partial.

title: Perfect location and great experience!
text: We stayed for 7 nights, the hotel is perfectly located and every member of the staff was very friendly and available. The room was impeccable and extremely comfortable and for sure it will be our first choice when we’ll get back. 5*

title: Best stay in Manhattan
text:
Right in the middle on Manhattan, it's nice to have a quick nap in between activities because it's super central, so there is no time wasting. The rooms are silent, the beds are super comfortable and there is always tea and coffee at the lobby. The wifi works perfectly so I was able to have my meetings with no problems.
Thank you Pestana!

title: Très bel hôtel et accueil EXCELLENT
text: L’accueil de l’hôtel est EXCELLENT. Le personnel se rend disponible et souriant. Même si le petit déjeuner n’est pas compris dans la location, l’hôtel offre café thé croissant et baggle tous les matins. Les chambres sont petites mais bien équipées. Hôtel très propre et proche de Times Square. Lit confortable. Pas de bruit. Je recommande. Merci à David et à la team dont une partie parle portugais.

title: Excelente personal.
text:
Excelente el trato recibido por el personal del hotel. Especialmente, nuestro agradecimiento y felicitación a David, Jorge, Guillermo, Marilyn y Aron por su amable atención, diligencia y profesionalidad.
Un cordial abrazo para todos.

title: Posizione comoda, albergo pulito e personale molto cordiale
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato una settimana in questo hotel nei pressi di Times Square, comodo per muoversi a New York.

L'albergo è molto pulito ed io personale è molto cordiale e disponibile.

Apprezzata anche la disponibilità di croissant e donuts a colazione offerti agli ospiti, considerato i costi di NY

title: Quiet, clean, thoughtful and innovative, fewer negative comments in web
text: It’s clean, quiet and Innovative in room for storage, the lattice, hanger, the under-bed drawer to max space.    I’ve stayed 8 nites, it’s as good as what commented in web.  By searched a few lodges before trip, CR7 is the one with fewer negative feedback.   It near time sq., edge, Macy by walk, convenient for food, shopping and subway.  Employees are friendly and considerate for help.  The spacious lobby is cozy w. free coffee, water, and apples, bagel in morning!

title: Pestana CR7 Times Square: uma agradável experiência!
text:
Tínhamos boas informações sobre o Hotel, mas as expectativas foram superadas. Nossas necessidades foram amplamente satisfeitas pelo staff do hotel, destacamos os seguintes funcionários: Guilherme, Maria João, Emily, Carolina, Marilyn, Jorge e David.
Falam inglês, espanhol e português. Todos muito atenciosos! Ambiente muito agradável.
Quartos limpos, arejados, com ótima metragem. Com certeza voltaremos!

title: Great stay in NY
text: A minha estadia de 6 noites  no  hotel Pestana CR7 foi excelente. Para além da localização, bem próximo de Times Square, possui todas as comodidades necessárias para uma boa estadia na cidade que nunca dorme. Apesar do quarto ser um pouco pequeno (quando comparado com os hotéis na Europa) a cama e as almofadas são simplesmente divinais. Autênticas nuvens que me proporcionaram noites de descanso inesquecíveis, após longos dias de atividade física. Fiquei agradavelmente surpreendida por termos croissants e bagels disponiveis de manhã, apesar de só termos marcado estadia sem pequeno almoço. Também estavam disponíveis, 24h por dia, chá, café, água e maçãs. Agradeço imenso ao Guilherme e à Maria João pela simpatia, pelo profissionalismo, bem como pelas sugestões e informações dadas, sempre que as solicitei.

title: Feels like home!
text:
Experiência fantástica!! Já viajei muitas vezes a NYC, mas esta foi a primeira como turista com familiares.
Não podia ter feito melhor opção. A simpatia e atenção ultrapassaram as expectativas. A cumplicidade a preparar uma surpresa de aniversário, foi fantástica e tornou o momento muito especial.
Sempre muito atenciosos, e preocupados em proporcionar a melhor experiência possível aos seus clientes. Como observador que sou, reparei que esse cuidado era com todos os que por lá passaram.
O hotel é muito confortável e a localização não podia ser melhor: 5/10 min a pé dos lugares mais procurados. Também fica muito perto de uma das estações de comboio e da de autocarros. Quem precisa desses transportes vai perceber como fica muito bem localizado.
Outro aspeto importante foi o facto de proporcionarem o armazenamento da bagagem até à hora de regresso. Para quem ainda tem muitas horas após o check-out.
Agradeço em especial aos funcionários que me ajudaram a preparar a surpresa de aniversário (Maria João e Guilherme), e a todos os outros, que sempre nos trataram com carinho e atenção.
O conforto sentido foi tal, que uma das frases que nos saiu num dos dias da nossa estadia, foi: vamos até casa descansar um bocadinho?
Mil obrigados!

title: First time in NYC at Pestana CR7 Times Square
text:
We arrived at the hotel around 7:30AM and were treated warmly, with an early check-in for no cost!
Our room was spacious, and filled with all the equipment needed, including a mini-fridge.
I have a future reservation for the end of the month, so I asked the hotel to store two deliveries and my luggage in the meantime, which was gladly agreed!
Overall the experience was great, the location of the hotel is very good and and the staff was awesome.
S/O to Marilyn, Jorge, David and Emily!

title: Hotel cómodo, moderno y perfectamente ubicado
text:
El hotel está muy nuevo y cuidado, Desde que entras la atención es delicada y muy cariñosa, nos hicieron la estancia muy fácil, ayudando en todo lo posible (gracias Genaro y María).
La habitación tiene lo suficiente para descansar bien, sin lujos, pero más que correcta. Las camas son grandes y cómodas y la temperatura la adecuada. La limpieza diaria es excelente (nos cambiaron las toallas todos los días).
El hotel no sirve desayuno como tal, pero como atención a los clientes sirven en recepción café y té con unos bagels, croasants y algo de fruta, lo que resulta más que suficiente y que puedes comer allí mismo en el bar.
La ubicación es perfecta, a menos de 10 minutos andando de Times Square, del Madison Square Garden, del Empire State Building y de varias estaciones de Metro, con lo que es sencillo y cómodo para visitar la ciudad.
Tiene muchos restaurantes cercanos.
Además, te atienden en español, lo que siempre ayuda. Sin duda repetiría en ese hotel, nos ha encantado.

title: Prima volta a NY
text: Consiglio il Pestana CR7 per la posizione, la pulizia e la cordialità dello staff. Ho trovato la camera molto spaziosa ed il letto comodissimo. Unica nota negativa il condizionatore troppo rumoroso. L’hotel è vicino alla metro ed ad alcune importanti attrazioni.

title: Muito bom!
text:
Equipe muito simpática e solícita! Excelente localização. Apesar de não ter café da manhã, todos os dias o hotel oferecia, sem custo, croissant e bagel (começa às 7h e tem que acordar e descer cedo se quiser comer, pois acaba logo).
2 pontos a revisar: orientações sobre o funcionamento do aquecedor/ar condicionado ( muito barulhento) e luz de led atrás da TV (desnecessária, principalmente por não termos controle de ligar e desligar).

title: Servicio y atención 5 estrella !
text:
Muy bonita estancia en la comodidad del hotel, céntrico, limpio y agradable. 
Una de las mejores atenciones del personal, muy amables y atentos. Marilyn, Harold, David, Victor y Genaro. 
Seguro regresamos

title: Stylish and good located comfortable hotel in midtown
text: Very stylish and comfortable hotel, friendly and helpful stuff (especially reception and Aaron at  the breakfast bar). . bagels, coffee, tea for free in the morning. 100 % recommend. I will come back here. Very good location to get to midtown Times Square 5th avenue madison square garden ….

title: Best Customer service! Excellent hotel!
text: Room is super cute! Staff is so nice. Victor at the fro t reception was especially super sweet, helpful and so accommodating. Made our first trip to NYC so special. Highly recommend this hotel. Thank you Victor! P

title: EL MEJOR HOTEL EN TIMES SQUARE
text: El mejor hotel de TIMES SQUARE un servicio excelente, todos son amables y cordiales, una atención espectacular a los latinos, todos hablan español te hacen sentir como en casa de verdad a sido mi mejor experiencia en un hotel de NEW YORK lo recomiendo sin dudarlo de verdad no encontrarán uno mejor.

title: Home from home at Pestana CR7 New York
text:
We enjoyed an excellent  stay at Pestana CR7 Tines Square.Great location for exploring New York, close to Times Square,hotel very clean and modern. 
Marilyn, Victor, Jorge and Dalvin, made  us very welcome, as if it was home from home.

title: Hotel bien ubicado con trato excelente. Nuevo, limpio y a precio
text: Un hotel bien ubicado, nuevo y limpio. Pero lo mejor de todo son las personas que trabajan aquí. Trato excelente, bilingües e incluso 3 idiomas. Hablaban español, portugués e inglés. Nos atendieron estupendamente. Es el hotel de Cristiano Ronaldo y está muy bien. Recomendable.

title: Pestana New York
text: Ottima posizione, a due passi da Time Square. Pulito. Camere moderne e bagni bellissimi. Staff gentile e sempre disponibile . Bella palestra sempre aperta. Non abbiamo provato la colazione. Jorge il più simpatico

title: Great place to stay!
text: Very friendly, helpful staff. Not much room to put a suitcase. Room was clean and comfortable. Great location. Watch for the "resort fee". It was was automatically added to the bill (via Bookings.com) and I didn't notice. We did not get a coffee machine and we didn't use the WiFi or fitness room.

title: Weekend Trip Stay
text: A nice, quiet, very clean hotel in a great central location. The staff were extremely helpful when I made a  special request. The decor is fun and there's a gym in the basement. There's no restaurant but there are plenty of good cafes in the area so this isn't a drawback.

title: EXCELENTE
text:
Nos ha encantado el hotel , la ubicación y el personal super amable.
Carolina super atenta al igual que Emily , Harold y el resto! Volveremos sin duda a este hotel y que nos hemos sentido como en casa. Muy bien ubicado y super limpio. Gracias por todo.

title: Great hotel!
text: Friendly staff, all very clean. Loved the convenience of the check in and check out process. My flight landed early and they were able to get me checked in and keep my bags safe so i did not have to wait for hours until 3 pm. Great option and definitely worth it. i will be staying here again on my next trip

title: Hotel excelente en el Midtown de New York
text:
Excelente hotel en una ubicación magnífica, cerca de Times Square, Madison Square Garden, Birlamd, y otros lugares de nterés.
Además inmejorable atención del personal, especialmente Marilyn y Víctor, siempre dispuestos a ayudarte en todo lo q necesites. Otro dato importante es q ambos hablan español.
Sin duda, repetiremos en nuestra vuelta a New York.

title: The best Hotel
text: Best location in Manhattan, close to main attractions. Excellent staff and good service. The staff were very helpful. I would rebook the hotel anytime I’m in New York. Very good value compared to other hotels. Special thanks to the team that offered a small cake and sparkling wine for my birthday! I will recommend you to my family and friends!

title: Amazing
text:
Staff were kind and considerate from the moment we arrived.
Stayed on 12th floor the room was perfect, even included mini fridge freezer, 
Nice bathroom and walk in shower.
Lift were fine, though recommend avoiding peak time 8-9am if at all possible.
Perfect location for getting around the city and seeing all the sites.
We had an amazing time, thank you!

title: Good location
text: very good location, near to subway station and main attraction. Aiports are easy accessible by train/metro near the hotel. The room are small but clean, and equipped perfectly. I will definite come back here the next time. Loved it so much!

title: La opción perfecta
text: Pasé dos días en el hotel por un viaje de negocios y sin duda repetiré en futuras ocasiones. Personal atento a cualquier solicitud, habitaciones cómodas y limpias. Todo en una ubicación inmejorable.  Una gran opción.

title: Fantástico staff!
text: Excelente experiencia. Hotel moderno con habitaciones muy limpias y, sobre todo, un staff muy amable. Les pedimos varias recomendaciones y, gracias a ellas, nuestra visita a Nueva York fue mucho mejor. Repetiría sin duda.

title: Excelente
text:
Foi a minha primeira vez em NY, reservamos este hotel pelas avaliações do Tripadvisor e não decepcionou. Quarto maior que muitos na cidade, preço justo. Fica a uns 6 minutos a pe de Times Square, mas super bem localizado. Vários pontos turísticos consegue-se fazer caminhando. Perto do metro e de vários restaurantes e Farmácias! O atendimento e de excelencia, os rececionistas estao sempre muito recetivos a atender todos os pedidos, ofereceram-nos o check in antecipado uma vez que cheguei as 11h  e no check out, como o meu voo era as 21h deixei as malas no hotel e voltei mais tarde.
Como sou cliente expedia vip tive direito a 6 artigos do mini bar gratuitos.
O Hotel nao oferece pequeno almoco no entanto surpreendeu com uma estacao com bagels, croissants, cafe, cha e fruta. O hotel tambem ofereceu descontos na maior loja de roupa aqui em Ny a Macys, valeu muito a pena.

title: Great stay in NYC!
text: I enjoyed my stay here a lot. The location is great, right next to Times Square but not close enough that it disrupts your rest. It's very easy to get to from airports with public transportation and very convenient to get pretty much anywhere from the hotel. The room was great, had all the necessities (although there was no closet), and I loved the free coffee, tea and apples that were available 24/7 in the lobby! The staff were all very friendly and helpful.

title: Gostei muito!!
text: Adoramos a nossa estadia no hotel! Cada membro da equipa foi tao simpatico e prestavel. A localizacao e otima, mesmo perto de Times Square, mas o hotel em si era tranquilo, um hotel mais disportivo. O metro tambem e muito perto do hotel. Adoramos a surpresa de (embora a inexistencia de pequeno-almoco no hotel), do hotel nos oferecer bagels e croissants pela manha e de ter disponivel durante todo o dia, como oferta, macas, café, cha e agua. Foi uma agradavel surpresa! Se voltarmos a Nova Iorque, sem duvida que vamos ficar novamente neste hotel!

title: Amazing
text:
Stayed here for one night while in this area of NY for a business I found my room to be of a good size, very clean, updated, and quiet. The hotel was in a great location for me!
The staff was very friendly and accommodating. I would definitely stay here again!!!

title: Best option
text: The location is extraordinary! The hotel is located a mere handful of steps off times square and Broadway. Despite that, the room was surprisingly quiet. Both of us slept well and besides some buzz from the vent / AC I did not hear anything during the night. The room, bathroom, and community areas were clean.

title: Trip to New York
text:
Staff bastante atencioso e prestável. Sempre atentos às necessidades dos seus hóspedes.
Agradável surpresa termos sempre um “pequeno almoço” com bagels pra grab and go. Café para levar também. Muito bom mesmo. Certamente voltarei. Obrigado.

title: Extremely poor customer service
text: Truly disappointed in my time with Pestana. I checked in on the 6th and quickly realized this wasn’t the safest location for a young lady to stay solo. Having issues trying to get in through the main door late at night while being heralded by the people camping outside. I immediately informed the management about canceling the reservation and changing my checkout date. Hotel so they were happy to honor it as long as the third-party that I went through sent the request after I sent the request to the third-party it was declined by the hotel. I tried to speak with the hotel again, and then was met with denial for a refund or even alteration to my stay. After explaining to management why I wasn’t able to finish staying. I was sent on a wild goose chase in regards to having someone help. Give me a partial refund for the nights that I wasn’t staying, but it was clear that they had no intention of ever giving me a refund or even trying to help work with my reservation.

title: Top!
text:
Top! Principalmente o pessoal da recepção, muito prestável e simpático.
O espaço é agradável e tem tudo o que é preciso para passar boa estadia. 
O quarto estava impecável e irei recomendar este hotel a amigos e familiares que decidam vir a NYC.

title: Pillows
text: Actualmente the pillos were facinanting. Deben mejorar la puerta de entrada. A veces no abre. Debería haber baño en el lobby. Las camas excelentes. La atención al público muy buena. 5 estrellas para marilyn

title: Recomendo
text:
Hotel muito bem localizado, correu tudo bem com a estadia fui muito bem recebido, vim numa viagem de negócios e o serviço foi excelente!
Costumo vir para este hotel com bastante frequência devido à localização e ao atendimento e nunca desilude.

title: Ótima localização, tamanho e limpeza.
text:
O hotel é muito bem localizado. Próximo da Times, Madison Square Garden, Empire State etc. O tamanho do quarto é ótimo, se considerados os tamanhos de NY. Havia espaço para guardar as malas no quarto (coisa que muitos reclamam de outros hotéis) e um pequeno guarda roupas para organizar as coisas. A limpeza e troca de amenidades é diária e boa. O “café da manhã”, uma cortesia com croissants e bagels quebra um ótimo galho. Recomendo o hotel. 
A gerente de recepção, Maria João, prestou um excelente serviço e nos fez sentir à vontade sempre que precisamos.

title: New York
text: Stayed here for 5 nights with some girlfriends. Nothing negative to say about this hotel. Pleasant  staff, rooms cleaned every day and clean towels. 5 minutes to Times Square. Complementary coffee and bagels in the morning a de definite plus. Would stay here again.

title: Great stay!
text:
The hotel was great! The rooms and the bathroom is small but there is a lot of possiblities to storage your clothes and the luggage. The service was very friendly and kind. We could stay longer in the room for a late checkout without any problem. The coffee and snacks that they over in the morning was very good and enough for everyone. 
When I come back to New York, I will definitly come back to this hotel.

title: Best Staff in NYC.
text:
This hotel is in the perfect location. Very close to everything. Rooms are small but very clean and nice. The bar downstairs is cute and has games you can play while you drink. After 9pm you have to use your key card to enter which I really like. 

Honestly I’d come back here just for the staff. The staff were my highlight of my stay. They provide southern charm in the Big Apple that’s truly refreshing. Jorge was such an amazing help from proving excellent local places to visit to helping me with the elevator. Marilyn and Emily were VERY QUICK to help my friend and I. We had some currency delays with the bank that really stressed us out hours before we were set to leave the country. These ladies really came through and let us do a late check out so we could take care of our business and not miss our flights. The staff 100 percent make this hotel. Come by and say hi to them!!!!

title: Far to small
text:
Hotel room very small and hard to move around in I appreciate that hotels in ny are historically small however this was far too small for two people the worst thing was that room service moved our suit case to clean which I understand if they just relocated it however there was no room for this so instead they turned one half over which cased a huge mess as all our belongings went everywhere and out clothes where screwed up! 

Going back to ny this December and I don’t think I will ever go back to a pestana hotel!

title: Boa relação qualidade/preço
text:
As pessoas são todas muito simpáticas, prestáveis, cuidadosas e amáveis. 
Tem um espaço agradável na recepção, muito funcional. 
Os quartos são bons, tem produtos portugueses da CastelBel que são maravilhosos. 

A localização é óptima, super central. 
Recomendo.

title: Excellent hotel
text:
Very clean, simple accommodations. Staff are friendly & accommodating. Is a great, central  location and value. Beds are comfortable, rooms are quiet considering it’s in the heart of the city. 
Appreciated having a steamer in the room as opposed to an iron (nice touch)

title: perfect
text:
The reception staff is so professional and helpful.
I will especially mention GENARO who helped me as soon as I arrived at the hotel and it turned out that I forgot my phone in the taxi....
And the girl in Spain (unfortunately I forgot her name) who helped us order tickets to the attractions.
The staff is simply wonderful!
The location of the hotel was excellent for us, although the rooms are small, but on the whole they get along and this is the case in all of New York.
Very worthwhile.

title: Simply great
text: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for a total of 6 nights. It was our very first time visiting NYC and we were there to celebrate our anniversary. Well…where do I begin, well…we just absolutely loved it! This hotel is located close to Times Square. The rooms are lovely and the beds are extremely comfy (what mattresses do you use? We want one for our home!) The staff are really friendly and offered us some great travel tips on how to get around the city (shout out to Emily on that one). Victor a shout out to you too for being super helpful! I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone as the staff do their best to make your stay as comfy as possible. Should we be lucky enough to visit the Big Apple once more, then this would be the place we would come back to. Thank you Pestana CR7 Times Square for being part of our memories and making our stay magical. A&A :)

title: Excelente!
text: Gostámos muito da nossa estadia. Ficámos em família num quarto com duas camas de casal super confortáveis. Fomos recebidos com uns "miminhos" no quarto: águas, fruta e mensagem personalizada de boas vindas. Todo o pessoal, desde os rececionistas até aos empregados de limpeza e de bar,  foram extremamente atenciosos e simpáticos. Muito bem localizado, tem um ambiente cuidado mas descontraído. Aconselhamos vivamente este hotel.

title: Definitely Stay Again
text: The front desk staff were very friendly and knowledgeable, especially Jorge. He made us feel like confident temporary New Yorkers. The room was bigger than we expected and the bed was comfortable. It is a short walk to the Port Authority, as well as Times Square with many restaurants and shops nearby.

title: Aralisse Was great and gave me good cu and gave me a gift after discovering that it was my birthday
text: Aralisse Was great and gave me good customer service and even gave me a gift after discovering that it was my birthday when I checked in overall I loved my stay here at the hotel and in New York I will be coming back

title: Fantastic Hotel
text:
We had a fantastic time at the CR7 Pestana.  The hotel is modern and the staff are very friendly and attentive.  The hotel is central and Times Square is only a short stroll away.  All major visitor attractions are easily within walking distance.  Central Park is only a 20 min stroll.

The subway (No 1 Line) is easily accessible for heading downtown to visit the statue of liberty or 9/11 memorial.  

The free tea/coffee and bagels in the morning are a real bonus and sets you up for a day exploring the city. 

I would highly recommend this hotel 

Keep up the good work guys 🙂

title: Foi tudo ótimo! Staff sempre presente, gentil e atenciosa. Localização excelente com muitas comodidades próximas.

title: Perfect location and great staff
text:
The Pestana Cr7 is my new favourite New York Hotel.

Located on 38th Street between 8th and 9th avenues, the pestana is perfectly situated for exploring Midtown Manhattan and beyond.

Just a few blocks walk from Penn Station (34th Street) and Port Authority subway and bus stations ( and close to a range of convenience stores such as 7/11 ) the Pestana CR7 felt like a safe option for travelling as a solo female for a long weekend. 

On arrival very late at night, after a delayed flight I couldn't gave wished for a warner welcome from the front desk staff. The bubbly and super attentive Mikaela came to meet me at the door, to help me with my luggage and Harvey, the other checkin assistant on duty was attentive, friendly and personable when checking me in.

The decor of the property is warm, inviting and fresh. The lobby is clean, bright and airy, with football decor as a theme, and lots of chairs, making it a comfortable place to wait throughout your stay.

Rooms in NYC are notoriously space saving but the Pestana makes the most of the space available. The room that I was given ( a comfort double ) offered more than enough space in addition to 2 comfortable double beds;( with medium pillows and a firm mattress ).  

My room also came with complimentary bathroom toiletries ( shower gel, conditioner, shampoo), a complimentary  bottle of water and what felt like an endless supply of towels.

The room amenities met all my needs.Although there is no wardrobe there are three hooks on a wall for hanging stuff up.  The room also comes with under bed storage and a safe and the wide-screen TV attached to the wall was perfectly placed for some late night viewing and the mini bar stocked fridge was perfect for storing my supersize meal leftovers. 

The bathroom ( which has a walk in shower with a semi fixed shower head ) has the most perfect bright lighting, and held a hairdryer and handheld steamer. Although the rooms don't come with an iron as default one quick request at reception had an ironing board and iron in my room in minutes. 

Elevators in some hotels can be frustrating slow, however, the 2 elevators in the Pestana Cr7 were very speedy at all times to/from my 12th floor room.

Often in New York (and I can confidently say this as a frequent traveller back and forth from the city), rooms are literally room only, with very few extras so the lack of a wardrobe or hanging space on my room felt acceptable, however, little touches like the mini breakfast offered to guests from 7am each day was a lovely gesture.  The complimentary  fresh bagels🥯 (accompanied by grape jelly and cream cheese ) & croissants helped to get my day started off right, along with a refreshing glass of ice water and/or cup of tea/coffee.

All in all, this hotel was wonderful and gains top marks from me for customer service and attention to detail.Nothing was too much trouble ( the team were very supportive in helping me arrange last minute late checkout) and without a doubt Harvey, Mikaela, Victor,  Danielle and the rest of the team should be so proud of the positive look that they bring to this brand, making it feel like a great value for money investment so, thanks again to the whole team for making my stay amazing!

title: Piacevolmente sorpresa
text:
Mi sono recata con il mio ragazzo in questo hotel 8 notti per passare il capodanno. 
Premetto di aver una fissa particolare per le camere e la loro grandezza, ma il prezzo era davvero competitivo rispetto ad altri hotel di mio interesse che volevano almeno il doppio. 
Dopo aver letto le varie recensioni non ero molto convinta della mia scelta, invece devo dire che sono rimasta piacevolmente stupita. 
Abbiamo alloggiato nella superior king (che credo cambi veramente poco dalle standard) ed è vero, la stanza ed il bagno sono molto piccoli, però tutto funzionale. Non c’è un vero e proprio armadio, ma questi cassettoni sotto il letto che contengono tranquillamente il quantitativo invernale di una valigia (25kg 😂). Presenza di un appendiabiti e di cassaforte.
Sotto il lavandino in bagno c’è lo spazio per riporre le varie trousse da viaggio. Letto comodissimo, tv con intrattenimento ove spesso su YouTube mettevamo film in italiano. 
Pulizia ottima, sempre 3 asciugamani per persona e shampoo/bagno schiuma con dispenser anche in doccia. Phone per capelli non a muro, ma normale, quindi “potente”.
Non abbiamo mai usufruito della colazione offerta perché volevamo provare le varie colazioni fuori, però devo dire che sicuramente non è da tutti gli hotel (soprattutto a NY) offrire brioche, pane, caffè/the; ed altra cosa non indifferente sempre a disposizione il dispenser dell’acqua da poter bere o riempire le proprie bottiglie. In parte ad esso, in diverse ore vedevo anche della frutta da poter prendere.
Personale molto educato, sorridente e disponibile (più i maschi che le femmine 😅).
Vicinanza a tutte le attrazioni e punti principali ottima. La via in cui si trova non è pericolosa, è semplicemente meno affollata.
Per concludere, esperienza positiva che non esiterei a consigliare.
